commit.message:
tree-if-conv.c (main_tree_if_conversion): Move bb under ENABLE_CHECKING.

2012-04-24  Richard Guenther  <rguenther@suse.de>

	* tree-if-conv.c (main_tree_if_conversion): Move bb under
	ENABLE_CHECKING.

From-SVN: r186763

files.patch:
